sentences.english: Zeng Guoquan was the younger brother of Zeng Guofan who was very famous general of the Xiang Army.
sentences.chinese: 曾國荃是曾國藩的胞弟，著名湘軍將領。

sentences.english: The expansion of the modern Hunan gentry forces benefits considerably from the establishment of Zeng Guofans Xiang Army.
sentences.chinese: 近代湖南紳權勢力的膨脹得益於曾國藩創辦的湘軍。

sentences.english: Zeng Guofang was an outstanding strategist in China's modern history.
sentences.chinese: 曾國藩是中國近代傑出的軍事家。
